definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: He then returned to his carrel for his own research.
sentences.chinese: 他接着就回到卡座去作自己的研究。

sentences.english: Thank you, Would you like the berth of hall or a compartment?
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，请问您喜欢大厅卡座还是包厢？

sentences.english: Would you like the hall berth or the compartment?
sentences.chinese: 先生，请问您喜欢大厅卡座还是包房？

sentences.english: They were in their own world, madly making out in their booth.
sentences.chinese: 他们在自己的世界里，在他们的卡座上疯狂。

sentences.english: Can't we sell Carol and get a tape deck for the Volvo?
sentences.chinese: 我们能不能把卡罗尔卖了，换一个沃尔沃的磁带卡座？

definition: by the window (referring to seats on a plane etc)
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
